    • Method Detail

      • isUsedBy

        public Character isUsedBy(Character character)
        Description copied from interface: Item
        Use the item on the player. If it's gold, it is added to his inventory. Else, it directly modify the player stats.
        Specified by:
        isUsedBy in interface Item
        Parameters:
        character - - the player ( a monster cannot use an item) who's using an item
        Returns:
        the player with his new stats due to the item
